participant_1.name: Carlos
participant_1.personality: Curious and passionate about languages, always looking to learn something new.
participant_1.background: my favorite spanish word is trabajo. my next language to study is french. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish. i also study languages.

participant_2.name: Jessica

participant_2.background: i enjoy being around people. i volunteer in a homeless shelter. i like to workout a a times a week. i'm a professional wrestler. in my spare time i do volunteer work.
